block.p: Anastasia Efimova, the daughter of Tatiana Nazarova of Moscow and the late Yuri Efimov, was married last evening to Boris Dolgonos, a son of Galina and Eugene Dolgonos of Oceanside, N.Y. Cantor Kerry Ben-David officiated at the Oaks, a conference center in New Rochelle, N.Y.
The bride and bridegroom, who were both born in Moscow, are associates specializing in corporate law at New York law firms. She works at Willkie Farr & Gallagher; he works at Weil, Gotshal & Manges.

Anastasia Efimova, Boris Dolgonos Anastasia Efimova, the daughter of Tatiana Nazarova of Moscow and the late Yuri Efimov, was married last evening to Boris Dolgonos, a son of Galina and Eugene Dolgonos of Oceanside,N.Y. Cantor Kerry Ben-David officiated at the Oaks, a conference center in New Rochelle, N.Y.

Anastasia Efimova, the daughter of Tatiana Nazarova of Moscow and the late Yuri Efimov, was married last evening to Boris Dolgonos, a son of Galina and Eugene Dolgonos of Oceanside, N.Y. Cantor Kerry Ben-David officiated at the Oaks, a conference center in New Rochelle, N.Y.
The bride and bridegroom, who were both born in Moscow, are associates specializing in corporate law at New York law firms. She works at Willkie Farr & Gallagher; he works at Weil, Gotshal & Manges.

The bride, 29, received a law degree from the Moscow State University and a Master of Laws from New York University. The bridegroom, 32, graduated from Harvard and received his law degree from the University of Virginia.
